name: Risk Alert Monitor
prompt: Quick risk check. Run `botcore get_paper_portfolio` to check daily PnL and `botcore get_paper_trading_status` to verify engine is running. ONLY alert if: daily loss exceeds 3% of portfolio, paper trading stopped unexpectedly, or any critical issue detected. If everything is normal, respond with exactly 'RISK_OK' and nothing else - do NOT send any notification. If alerting, send URGENT notification to Telegram using `botcore send_telegram_notification '{{"message":"\ud83d\udea8 RISK ALERT: <what triggered, severity, recommended action>"}}'`. Be urgent and specific.
